snippet: Iraq has hanged 42 prisoners convicted of terrorism-related charges, the Justice Ministry said Thursday.
abstract: Iraq hangs 42 prisoners convicted of terrorism-related charges; rights groups have questioned trial  procedures in Iraqi courts and urged moratorium on all executions, but the government defends the death penalty as a way to deter insurgents.
lead_paragraph: Iraq has hanged 42 prisoners convicted of terrorism-related charges, the Justice Ministry said Thursday.
